name: 幸存者 星星之火 | Survivor Spark
name_original: 幸存者 星星之火 | Survivor Spark
description:
Although transformed into a super fighter by alien technology, it is unexpected that human memory has not been cleared. As an unexpected survivor of this catastrophe, you bear the fate of the city and try to resist the aliens with your own strength. Flexible mechanical body, super technology energy shield, powerful alien energy weapons will be used for you. Defeat the aliens and try to protect the city, survivors!

Any mechanism or enemy can easily take your life



Flexible movement and invincible jumping can effectively avoid the attack of enemies and organs



Break the supply box to get all kinds of props, shields and bullets. Continuous jumping can help you defeat enemies and save the earth



Seize the opportunity to break the fort is the key to customs clearance, and at the same time, continuously defeat the enemy can increase the score



Challenge the more crazy enemies, full of bullets and traps on the screen, and gain infinite sense of achievement



Saving energy can release skills to cause fatal damage to enemies by defeating them
